componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: June 2022

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: From regulations to sustainability, a number of factors are critical for adhesive selection when producing a high-quality label. Learn what industry experts have to say, including FLEXcon's Dan Riendeau, Strategic Business Unit Manager, ackaging, in this L&NW article.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
The Plush Life: Carpet Graphics

Digital Output

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Material optimized for floor graphic applications is prevalent. As media buyers become more sophisticated and start requesting graphics for all types of flooring surfaces—from concrete to tile and hardwood—print service providers (PSPs) must become better educated on the best type of substrate for the job.

The third and final article in Digital Output's series on floor graphics looks at carpet and offers lots of great advice, from material selection to installation.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: In this article written for WhatTheyTh!nk, Jodi Sawyer explains how being flexible and willing to reimagine businesses to support trends such as buy-online-pick-up-in-store (BOPIS), digital advertising, and sustainability will be critical for printers to stay relevant moving forward.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: The Power of Sustainable Print in the Digital World

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: You won't want to miss the Sustainable Green Printing Partnership's Sustainability Summit. Make plans now to join FLEXcon at this industry event focused on Sustainability. Happening July 20th at Fenway Park in Boston, MA, thought leaders and community stakeholders will come together in pursuit of more accountable sustainable print supply chains.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Installation of Large-Format Graphics Has Never Been Easier!

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Prevent Air Entrapment with Air Egress Liner

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
FLEXcon® FLEXmark® promotional advertising products with air egress liner offer versatility and ease of use.

  • Total applied cost savings
  • Less time-consuming to install
  • Less chance of air entrapment
  • Easier installation for novices

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
If Designing It Is Hurdle #1,
Then Making It Is Hurdle #2.


FLEXcon was proud to have Bill Sullivan, Exec. V.P. of Business & Technology Discovery, speak at the TechConnect World Innovation Conference & Expo last week about manufacturing considerations for innovators.

The conference connects top applied research and early-stage innovations from universities, labs, and startups with industry end-users and prospectors. It is the world's largest nanotechnology event.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: As sponsor of the PDAA Architectural Films Workshop last week, FLEXcon materials took center stage as attendees learned to install large-format graphics on a variety of surfaces.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Mission Accomplished!

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Sean from Auto Trim Hawaii takes pride in his successful install of a FLEXmark® WR floor graphic. 

Learn more about FLEXcon's products for large-format advertising.
